body.p: This topic contains information about how you can reference images from your HTML or XML documents.

For HTML, the img tag is recognized as an image without any other styling in your CSS files:...

And this is the picture of a happy face: .

...

For XML, you must add CSS rules that pick up the content of an attribute and uses it as a source for the image:... <para> And this is the picture of a happy face: <imagedata fileref="happy.png"/>.</para> ...
